text: You can‚Äôt fully understand the frustration until you work in the medical field. 25 years in the ER and that ‚ÄúThe Pitt‚Äù clip sums it up perfectly - they want medical advice but if they don‚Äôt like your answer then you‚Äôre a fraud or an idiot, don‚Äôt know what you‚Äôre talking about. My mother is a keen practitioner of this. Then why the eff did you ask me if you have all the answers?! I give Dr Mike a lot of credit for trying to talk to people that are irreversibly brainwashed. Which makes it more funny because if you are so quick to believe something from one person just because it is different (and likely wrong) then why can‚Äôt you be persuaded back the other way? People don‚Äôt want money, or good health‚Ä¶ people want attention however they can get it.

text: Over 90% of his statement is bullshit. In 2021 I was talking to an ICU nurse (he was vaxxed AND was wearing 3 surgical masks in the street). text:
There was an Australian doctor charged with medical fraud for deliberately switching the vaccine with saline. Why did he do this? Probably money. He was probably paid to inject and falsify documents.

One clinic accidentally mixed up empty/saline filled vials and prepared syringes from them by mistake.

Neither of these things is what she is actually referring to. I believe she or someone whose content she has consumed as deliberately misconstrued these incidents OR they're making up stories to explain away the fact that well known people were publicly promoting the vaccine by having pictures or doing it for tv.
